title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
text:
Maximize your team's productivity with our affordable pricing.

Just $2 per user per month - a fraction of the cost of time lost to status meetings and interruptions. No hidden fees, no complicated tiers.

features.title: Everything Included
features.text: All features are included in one simple plan. Get automated daily reports, minute-by-minute tracking, and real-time status updates for every team member.

features.title: Unlimited Projects
features.text: Track time across all your GitHub Projects v2 boards. No limit on the number of projects or repositories you can connect.

features.title: Complete Data History
features.text: Access your full time tracking history anytime. We store your data securely and make it easily accessible whenever you need it.

features.title: Free Trial Available
features.text: Try Time Tracker free for 14 days. No credit card required. Experience how it can transform your team's productivity risk-free.
